document.bingtitle: I hate washing the dishes? - Yahoo! UK & Ireland Answers
document.webtitle: I hate washing the dishes? - Yahoo! UKIreland Answers
document.description: - put on a good t.v show, and each commercial ... takes people who stay with him to a local fast food restaurant ... Paper plates, cuttery, and cups. That's what I do.
